# Introduction

Tutorial on how to configure and set up the scanpy on fac04.

# Setup environment

```{bash}
cd /cvmfs/soft.galaxy/v2.1/tool-dependency/_conda/
source bin/activate
conda create --name __scanpy-scripts@0.2.10 scanpy-scripts=0.2.10 --channel bioconda --channel conda-forge
conda activate __scanpy-scripts@0.2.10
```
